name: Wisps
description: A platformer where you play as Death's henchman fighting an evil sorcerer. You have to defeat their three evil generals, and to do that, you have to explore through three different worlds, each with their own theme.  Each world has three levels, and then a boss level. After you beat all three generals, you can challenge the sorcerer. As you go through the worlds, you will unlock new upgrades.
